amendment.description: Amendment increases the funding for Capital and Debt Service Grants to the National Railroad Passenger Corporation by $9 million for the purpose of installing inward facing cameras in locomotives.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase the funding for Capital and Debt Service Grants to the National Railroad Passenger Corporation by $9 million for the purpose of installing inward facing cameras in locomotives. The proposed increase is offset by reductions in other accounts in the bill including from the St. Lawrence Seaway Development Corporation.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Dent amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Dent amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Dent.
